abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column observes that a bigger market than St Louis will provide first baseman Albert Pujols with more riches in free agency, but it will also be more demanding of him.
snippet: A bigger market than St. Louis will provide first baseman Albert Pujols with more riches in free agency, but it will also be more demanding of him.
lead_paragraph: A bigger market than St. Louis will provide first baseman Albert Pujols with more riches in free agency, but it will also be more demanding of him.

headline.main: Pujols Won’t Find Unconditional Love Anywhere Else
headline.print_headline: Pujols Won’t Find Unconditional Love Anywhere Else
headline.seo: Pujols Won’t Find Unconditional Love Elsewhere - George Vecsey
